## SlideShowSettings.ShowMediaControls 属性

显示媒体控制

```csharp
public bool ShowMediaControls { get; set; }
```

### 示例

```csharp
[C#]
using (Presentation pres = new Presentation())
{
    pres.SlideShowSettings.ShowMediaControls = true;
}
```
